CHAT.comment: ERIC H. HOLDER, JR., ATTORNEY GENERAL, ET AL., Petitioners v. HUMANITARIAN LAW PROJECT, ET AL. And HUMANITARIAN LAW PROJECT, ET AL., Petitioners v. ERIC H. HOLDER, JR., ATTORNEY GENERAL, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:09 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID D. COLE ON BEHALF OF HUMANITARIAN LAW PROJECT, ET AL.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GEN. ELENA KAGAN ON BEHALF OF ERIC H. HOLDER, JR., ET AL.
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID D. COLE ON BEHALF OF HUMANITARIAN LAW PROJECT, ET AL.
(Whereupon, at 11:13 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
